Minnie Sue Coleman (Ọktoba 11, 1926 na Jenụwarị 3, 2012) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme akwa akwa Gee's Bend, ya na nné ya, Minder Coleman. N'afọ 2006, ihe nríte "Pig in a Pen" ya pụtara na stampụ ọrụ US Postal dị ka akụkụ nke usoro na-echeta ihe ndị na-eme ka Gee nwee nkwonkwo.
